"	"Welcome to the Guess K-pop app! In this app, you can test your knowledge of K-pop. You have three main game modes:"
" 1) Guess the Star"
" 2) Guess the Band"
" 3) Group Sorting"
" "Using these game modes, you can memorize all the most famous K-pop groups and their incredible members! And, of course, test your knowledge!"
" Each game mode has its own achievements, which can be viewed in the main menu."
" p.s: We welcome any feedback on the app's page on the Play Store "
" Good luck and have fun!
Congratulations! You have achieved a new record:

The "Guess the Star" game mode allows you to test your knowledge of K-pop stars."
" Guess the names of K-pop artists from their photos. It doesn't matter which group the star belongs to on the screen, but it's important to know his or her name. You have 3 lives. Correct answers will increase your score, and incorrect ones will take away lives. "
" Additionally, for every 35 points, you will get 1 life, and for every 70 points, a hint will be added. But I think you'll figure it out."
" Good luck :)

The "Guess the Band" game mode allows you to test your knowledge of the most famous K-pop groups in history! Guess the group to which the artist on the screen belongs. Each correct answer increases your score! And an incorrect one reduces lives. Of course, when lives run out, the game will end."\n" Additionally, you have 3 hints per game, which will show you the letters that make up the name of the K-pop group. Every 35th guessed group will restore one life to you. And every 70th will add a hint. But I think you\'ll figure it out."\n" Good luck ;)

The "Group Sorting" game mode allows you to test your knowledge of K-pop groups"
" You are given a set of various K-pop stars, and you need to distribute them into 2 groups. To distribute artist cards, you need to swipe them to the corresponding K-pop group on the screen. "
" After distribution, you can view all artist cards and redistribute them. After confirming your distribution, you will see if everything is distributed correctly, after which you will move on to the next pair of groups. "
" Every time you make a mistake of more than one artist, one of your lives will be lost. Once all lives are gone, the game will end. You will receive 1 point for every correctly distributed pair of artists. So try to answer correctly! Also, there are hints - they will show the names of the artists to make it easier for you to understand which group they belong to."
" Lives are restored every 50 points, and hints - every 100 points. "
" In reality, it's all much easier - good luck!"
